name: Vault
tagline: Vault help you create and managing encrypted folders
body:
### Welcome to Vault Homepage.
Vault is a program written in Python and Gtk that make use of encfs (http://linux.die.net/man/1/encfs) and helps you create and managing encrypted folders.

## Installation:

```
$ sudo apt-add-repository ppa:christriant/ppa
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install vault
```


## Issues:
If you find a bug please report it [here](https://bugs.launchpad.net/vault-encfs/+filebug) with instructions how to replicate it.

## Help
If you want to help you can translate Vault to your language! To do it, you must head over [here](https://translations.launchpad.net/vault-encfs) and start translating!

### Authors and Contributors
In 2012, Chris Triantafillis (@Clepto)
.
